search.query: index="keystrokes" type=KeyDown | transaction endswith="keyCode=33 OR key=SPACE OR key=DELETE OR key=NULL OR key=TAB OR key=UP OR key=DOWN OR key=LEFT OR key=RIGHT OR key=RETURN OR key=ENTER OR key=ESCAPE OR key=CLEAR OR key=HOME OR key=HELP OR key=PGUP OR key=PGDN OR key=END" mvlist=true keeporphans=true | eval source="<<<" + source + ">>>" | strcat chars source word | rex mode=sed field=word "s/(\<\<\<\/opt\/splunk\/etc\/apps\/stream_splunk_usage_demo\/data\/keys\.log\>\>\>)+//g" | eval WORD=case(keyCode==123, "<<L ARROW>>",keyCode==124, "<<R ARROW>>",keyCode==125, "<<D ARROW>>",keyCode==126, "<<U ARROW>>",keyCode==51, "<<DELETE>>",keyCode==53, "<<ESCAPE>>") | strcat word WORD word | table word
